rukus.text: 96|1|[Ej Pajomʙar] Bixon ʙa nomi Parvardigorat, ki [hastiro] ofarid
96|2|[Hamon Parvardigore, ki] Insonro az xuni ʙasta ofarid
96|4|[Hamon] Kase, ki ʙa vasilai qalam [naviştan] omūxt
96|5|Ba inson on ciro, ki namedonist, omūxt
96|6|Cunin nest [ki şumo mepindored]; haqqo, ki inson tuƣjon [va sarkaşī] mekunad
96|7|[Ba'd] Az in ki xudro ʙenijoz [va tavongar] ʙuʙinad
96|8|Jaqinan, ʙozgaşt [-i hama] ʙa sūji Parvardigori tust
96|9|[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo didaī on kase, ki [az iʙodati Alloh taolo] ʙozmedorad
96|11|Ba man xaʙar ʙideh, agar in [ʙanda] ʙar [rohi] hidojat ʙoşad
96|12|[Mardumro] Ba parhezkorī farmon dihad [pas, sazoi kase, ki cunin ʙandaero ʙijozorad cist]
96|13|Ba man xaʙar deh, agar in [şaxsi sarkaş haqro] takziʙ kard va rūjgardon şud [ojo sazovori azoʙ nest]
96|14|Ojo namedonad, ki ʙe tardid, Alloh taolo [hama a'molaşro] meʙinad
96|15|Cunin nest [ki ū gumon mekunad]; agar ʙoz naojad [va dast az şarorat ʙarnadorad], hatman, mūji peşoniaşro ʙa saxtī xohem girift [va ʙa sūji duzax xohem kaşonid]
96|19|Cunin nest [ki ū mepindorad]; hargiz ūro itoat makun va saçda kun va [ʙa Alloh taolo] taqarruʙ çūj
